fullText:
Contagious Challenge

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, paladin, divine challenge power
Benefit: When you hit an enemy marked by your divine challenge, you also subject one enemy adjacent to the target to your divine sanction. This divine sanction lasts until the start of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 138.
name: Contagious Challenge
